subject: Final step
body:
We have created a temporary account for you, and our lenders have made
an offer.
Our refinance department would like you to complete our C0NFIRMATION
F0RM before telling you the details of your refinance options.
 
We have already found a willing lender, but they would like you to
complete their C0NFIRMATION F0RM before releasing your agreement.
 
Please follow our secure link.
 
C0NFIRMATION F0RM
 
Thank you
 
Accounting Department
Hassle-Free Inc.
Hermila Vanegas
 
 
Copyright ©2007 Hassle-Free Inc
